languages.text: "Не смейте отчитывать при мне моих же блюстителей". {n}Стальная госпожа согласна с ним, но гордыня не позволяет признать это. Она боится показаться слабой. Лишиться контроля. Потерять уважение. И этим может сорвать охоту.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Довольно, Инфернус-мастер. Не смейте отчитывать при мне моих же блюстителей — лейтенант действует согласно уставу".
{n}Ты согласна с его словами, но гордыня не позволяет тебе признать это. Ты боишься показаться слабой. Лишиться контроля. Потерять уважение. И даже не осознаешь, что этим можешь сорвать охоту.{/n}

languages.text: "Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me." {n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She is afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не смейте отчитывать при мне моих же блюстителей". {n}Стальная госпожа согласна с ним, но гордыня не позволяет признать это. Она боится показаться слабой. Лишиться контроля. Потерять уважение. И этим может сорвать охоту.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me."
{n}Steel Mistress agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She's afraid of appearing weak. Of losing control, losing respect. And by doing so, she may ruin the hunt.{/n}

{n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She's afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}

"Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me." {n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She is afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}

"Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me." {n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She is afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}

languages.text: "Wagt es ja nicht, meine eigenen Enforcers vor mir zu tadeln." {n}Stahlherrin ist offenkundig ganz seiner Meinung, doch ihr Stolz gestattet ihr nicht, das einzugestehen. Sie hat Angst, schwach zu wirken — die Kontrolle zu verlieren, den Respekt. Und dadurch verdirbt sie womöglich die Jagd.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me." {n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She is afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wagt es ja nicht, meine eigenen Enforcers vor mir zu tadeln. {n}Stahlherrin ist offenkundig ganz seiner Meinung, doch ihr Stolz gestattet ihr nicht, das einzugestehen. Sie hat Angst, schwach zu wirken — die Kontrolle zu verlieren, den Respekt. Und dadurch verdirbt sie womöglich die Jagd.{/n}

languages.text: «No se atreva a reprender a mis guardias en mi presencia». {n}Señora de Acero está de acuerdo con él, pero su orgullo no le permite admitirlo. Tiene miedo de aparentar debilidad; de perder el control, el respeto. Y ese miedo puede arruinar la caza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me." {n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She is afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No se atreva a reprender a mis guardias en mi presencia». {n}Señora de Acero está de acuerdo con él, pero su orgullo no le permite admitirlo. Tiene miedo de aparentar debilidad; de perder el control, el respeto. Y ese miedo puede arruinar la caza.{/n}

languages.text: 「私の前で私のエンフォーサーを叱責しないでほしい」{n}鉄の淑女は明確に同意しているものの、そのプライドがそれを認めさせない。彼女は弱いと思われること…制御を、尊敬を失うことを恐れている。そしてそうすることで、彼女が狩りを台無しにしてしまうかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me." {n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She is afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私の前で私のエンフォーサーを叱責しないでほしい」{n}鉄の淑女は明確に同意しているものの、そのプライドがそれを認めさせない。彼女は弱いと思われること…制御を、尊敬を失うことを恐れている。そしてそうすることで、彼女が狩りを台無しにしてしまうかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: “你好大的胆子，竟敢在我面前斥责我的部下。”{n}很显然，“钢铁女士”同意“烈焰之心”的观点，但她的傲慢让她无法承认这一段。她害怕自己露出软弱的样子，害怕失去控制与敬畏。如果这样下去，她可能会毁掉这场狩猎。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me." {n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She is afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你好大的胆子，竟敢在我面前斥责我的部下。”{n}很显然，“钢铁女士”同意“烈焰之心”的观点，但她的傲慢让她无法承认这一段。她害怕自己露出软弱的样子，害怕失去控制与敬畏。如果这样下去，她可能会毁掉这场狩猎。{/n}

languages.text: « Je vous interdis de réprimander mes prévôts en ma présence. » {n}Maîtresse d'acier est clairement d'accord avec lui, mais sa fierté l'empêche de l'admettre. Elle a peur de paraître faible. De perdre le contrôle. Le respect. Et puis, elle risquerait de gâcher la chasse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me." {n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She is afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vous interdis de réprimander mes prévôts en ma présence. » {n}Maîtresse d'acier est clairement d'accord avec lui, mais sa fierté l'empêche de l'admettre. Elle a peur de paraître faible. De perdre le contrôle. Le respect. Et puis, elle risquerait de gâcher la chasse.{/n}

languages.text: "Sakın önümde infazcılarımı azarlamaya kalkışma." {n}Görünüşe göre Çelikten Hanım onunla hemfikir ancak gururu bunu itiraf etmesine müsaade etmiyor. Zayıf görünmekten... Kontrolü ve saygıyı kaybetmekten korkuyor. Böyle yaparak da ava zararı dokunabilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare reprimand my own enforcers in front of me." {n}Steel Mistress clearly agrees with him, but her pride will not let her admit it. She is afraid of appearing weak — of losing control, respect. And by so doing, she may spoil the hunt.{/n}
